class.name: crane_controllers/CraneTipVelocityForwardController
class.description: A crane tip cartesian velocity forward controller

class.name: crane_controllers/CraneStateController
class.description: The joint state controller is publishes the current joint state as a sensor_msgs/JointState message. The joint state controller expects a JointStateInterface type of hardware interface.
